TopicTitle: My version of the KSP Theme song.

Articles.Content:
So I spent this last weekend redoing the KSP theme song as a small "get back into writing music after a year long writing block" project.

I'm quite pleased with how it turned out, but I thought I'd see what other people thought also.

You can hear it here: https://soundcloud.com/joecleverley/ksp-title-screen-theme

What do you guys think?

Sounds almost movie like. It would be ideal for a trailer of sorts, or a short movie, but in my opinion, since one does not spend that much time in menu, a shorter start would be required. But if the music started playing during the initial loading, it might get there in time, if you catch my meaning.

I kinda like it.
This is definitely more uplifting however I would agree with Einsty that the intro would take too long but its still really nice.

This is definitely more uplifting however I would agree with Einsty that the intro would take too long but its still really nice.

Sure, if it was going to be used in the actual game then I'd definately cut that start out.
We have found our new credits theme

Hey, uh, anyone know a website I can buy a new jaw? Mine kinda dropped off its hinges and broke on the floor, but I guess it doesn't matter anyways, I'd keep loosing it over and over again stuck in a trance of musical awesomeness...

it reminds me of Star Trek as well, but the march like theme reminds also of Final Fantasy XI in the character design screen. Yea, yea, I am old fart at gaming, but, I gotta say it now: SAN D'ORIA FOREVER!!
What program did you use to make it?
Very well done! I really like the sound of it, deserves much recognition
This is awesome. It beats the old out of the water

Thanks for all the kind things said guys, it's really fantastic to hear it was enjoyed.

You can download it for free off that sound cloud page also, so help yourself.

I'll def keep writing music for this game then, I'd explode if it were ever used by Squad, but it's inspired me nonetheless.

I used an old old version of Cubase and some East West instruments I bought about 3-4 years ago.

I did this as a way to get back into music, I haven't written anything in a long time, so that's why it's all outdated.

Work with what you've got though right?
This is truly amazing, I have always loved the KSP theme, but...... I.... Just can't.... If I were a Kerbal, I would feel proud right now.
